content: I know it's possible to move datasets but is it possible to move a sub-dataverse to another sub-dataverse. I'm pretty sure that isn't possible from the web UI but can it be done via the API?
Right, it's only possible via the API: https://guides.dataverse.org/en/6.4/admin/dataverses-datasets.html#move-a-dataverse-collection

We still on 5.14 trying to get the database updated. I'll check the 5.14 documentation.
